BackgroundStory: Create a grass area with a pond in it.

Format.Description: Construct the grid based on the description provided in the 'BackgroundStory' section of the json. Please make sure the 10x10 grid map is represented in a text format suitable for parsing. Only provide the map in your response. Format the map as a table with 10 rows and 10 columns, where each cell contains a three-digit ObjectID of the tile which are provided in the 'EnvironmentTiles' section. Separate each ID with a pipe '|' symbol and terminate each row with a newline character '\n'.
